descriptions.name: What's Included
descriptions.value:
• Site plans & permitting: We handle the paperwork
  • All construction & finishes: From excavation to final touches
  • Top-tier equipment: Pentair pumps and filters, built to last
  • Start-up & maintenance: Includes water balancing and 1 month of professional cleaning

descriptions.name: Specifications
descriptions.value:
• Size: 8’ x 15’
  • Depth: 3.5’ shallow end, 5.5’ deep end
  • Coping: 1’ concrete coping
  • Construction: Reinforced concrete
  • Finish: Micro pebble plaster
  • Equipment: Industry-leading Pentair pumps and filters
